@description: A veteran warrior who fought on many battlefields. He becomes uncontrollable in battle when berserk.
Her father is a master assassin. Throughout her youth, she mastered the techniques of fighting.
Stripped of his status. He wanders around protecting others and stays true to his code of honour.
A wandering swordsman looking for his master. He is one who has mastered the Magic Sword.
He is the current owner of Takeshi's blade. His movements are fluid and sharp like a knife.
A girl who's brought up by forest spirits. She loves nature and protects the forest from disturbance.
His youth is bound by hatred. He acts like a wise-crack due to his life.
A woman whose destiny was to become a saint. She is full of passion and gives equal love to the enemy.
A witch who delivered fear to mankind. But through a failed reincarnation, she has lost her memory.
A hermit who avoids the populace by living in the mountains. He seeks the true identity of the evil star.
